Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.View.GUI

Class ChoosePlayersController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.View.ViewObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP47.View.GUI.ChoosePlayersController
public class ChoosePlayersController
extends ViewObservable
This class is the controller of the choosePlayers.fxml scene. In this scene the player can choose how many players there will be in the game.

  • Method Details

    • ClickOnDone

      void ClickOnDone​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This method notifies the controller with the number of player chosen by the user.
      Parameters:
      event - the click of the mouse on the Done button.

    • notifyAndWait

      private void notifyAndWait​(VisitableInt visitableInt)
      This method loads a new scene that will be visible until the other players connect.
      Parameters:
      visitableInt - the number of players chosen by the user.

    • handleThreePlayers

      void handleThreePlayers​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method handles with the choose of a three players game.
      Parameters:
      event - the click on the three players checkBox.

    • handleTwoPlayers

      void handleTwoPlayers​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method handles with the choose of a two players game.
      Parameters:
      event - the click on the two players checkBox.
